name: tm68
effect: Teaches Giga Impact to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Giga Impact to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user charges the foe using every bit of its power. It must rest on the next turn to recover.
flavor_text.platinum: The user charges the foe using every bit of its power. It must rest on the next turn to recover.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user charges the foe using every bit of its power. It must rest on the next turn to recover.
